name: TRR
author: AFNI Developers
description: Test-Retest Reliability Program through Bayesian Multilevel Modeling

inputs.description: Specify the number of Markov chains
inputs.name: Number of chains

inputs.description: Specify the number of iterations per Markov chain
inputs.name: Number of iterations

inputs.description: Specify the column name for the response variable
inputs.name: Response variable

inputs.description: Specify the column name for the subject variable
inputs.name: Subject variable

inputs.description: Specify the column name for the repetition variable
inputs.name: Repetition variable

inputs.description: Specify the column name for the condition variable
inputs.name: Condition variable

inputs.description: Specify the path to the data table in pure text format
inputs.name: Data table

inputs.description: Specify the distribution for the response variable (e.g., 'gaussian', 'student', 'exgaussian')
inputs.name: Response Distribution

inputs.description: Specify the effects associated with explanatory variables
inputs.name: Model

inputs.description: Specify the layout of posterior distribution plot (PDP) with width and height in inches
inputs.name: Posterior distribution plot size

inputs.description: Include standard error for the response variable as input
inputs.name: Standard error column

inputs.description: Specify the column name for the t-statistic values
inputs.name: T-statistic column

inputs.description: Invoke within-chain parallelization; specify number of threads per chain
inputs.name: Within-chain parallelization

inputs.description: Enable R to save the parameters for debugging
inputs.name: Debug flag

output-files.description: Main output file containing inference information for effects of interest
output-files.name: Output text file

output-files.description: Density plot of the TRR distribution
output-files.name: Output PDF file

output-files.description: Saved R data in binary format for post hoc processing
output-files.name: Output RData file
